CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests         wget         ca-certificates     && mkdir -p /etc/nginx/geoip     && wget http://geolite.maxmind.com/download/geoip/database/GeoLiteCountry/GeoIP.dat.gz -O /etc/nginx/geoip/GeoIP.dat.gz     && wget http://geolite.maxmind.com/download/geoip/database/GeoLiteCity.dat.gz -O /etc/nginx/geoip/GeoLiteCity.dat.gz     && gunzip /etc/nginx/geoip/GeoIP.dat.gz     && gunzip /etc/nginx/geoip/GeoLiteCity.dat.gz     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
